alert.note: Alert for Grenada; Leflore (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 13 at 3:31AM CDT until July 14 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT TODAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of north central Mississippi, including the following counties, Grenada and Leflore. * WHEN...Until Noon CDT today. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Extensive street flooding and flooding of creeks and rivers are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Significant flooding is possible as 6 to 10 inches of rain with locally higher amounts may fall over portions of north central Mississippi while 3 to 6 inches may fall over a large portion of central and east Mississippi.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
